txt.en:
'I heard that Bilbo got up to a whole mess of adventures after his party, but you're wondering what he's up to now, yes?

'Well I'll tell you that I heard that in the end, he ran into some of those big folk what ride horses all the time… what 're they called… the Riders of Ronald?  Roger? No, nearly there... tip of my tongue… Rohan!  That's it!  I hear he's got himself a war-pony and that they taught him to be a proper horse-master and all! 

'Rides in the company of, drat it, what's the feller's name… Theon...no… Theorem, ach, that's not it either.. hang it all, give me a minute… Théoden!  That's the chappy!  Our Bilbo's right there, riding in that company of Big Folk, with banners streaming and horses whinnying, all across those big plains of grass tall enough to hide a hobbit, or so I hear!'
Hereward Loamsdown has agreed to share a story about Bilbo Baggins and his adventures.
'Ah! You're collecting stories about Bilbo Baggins?  I know a grand of one for ya, that fellow's been some places and seen some things, yes he most certainly has!'
